summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SuriRentals new employee management and exchange rate features. All backend APIs working perfectly (32/32 tests passed). Frontend functionality excellent with all new features working correctly including EUR toggle, employee management, and salary payments integration with kasgeld.
passed_tests: Login with demo credentials (demo@suriname.sr / demo123456)
Exchange rate API endpoint /api/exchange-rate working with live rates
Exchange rate refresh button functionality
Kasgeld page loads with EUR toggle button
EUR toggle switches amounts between SRD and EUR display
Werknemers (employees) page loads correctly
Employee creation via UI (name, position, salary, phone, email, start date)
Employee editing functionality
Salary payment creation via UI
Employee selection dropdown in salary payment form
Salary payments appear in kasgeld transaction history
Kasgeld balance correctly decreases after salary payments
Navigation to Werknemers page works
Navigation between all pages (Dashboard, Kasgeld, Werknemers)
Backend API: Get Exchange Rate (GET /api/exchange-rate)
Backend API: Create Employee (POST /api/employees)
Backend API: Get Employees List (GET /api/employees)
Backend API: Update Employee (PUT /api/employees/{id})
Backend API: Delete Employee (DELETE /api/employees/{id})
Backend API: Create Salary Payment (POST /api/salaries)
Backend API: Get Salary Payments (GET /api/salaries)
Backend API: Delete Salary Payment (DELETE /api/salaries/{id})
Backend API: Kasgeld integration with salary payments
Backend API: Dashboard integration with employee data
Frontend: All data-testids present and functional
Frontend: Employee form validation and submission
Frontend: Salary payment form with employee selection
Frontend: Kasgeld transaction history showing salary payments
Frontend: Balance calculations including salary deductions
Integration: Frontend-backend communication for all new features
Integration: Real-time updates between Kasgeld and Werknemers pages
All existing functionality still working (tenants, apartments, payments, deposits, maintenance)

success_percentage.backend: 100% (32/32 tests passed including all new employee and exchange rate endpoints)
success_percentage.frontend: 100% (all new features working perfectly, excellent UI integration)
